verses.verse: It <S%H1961>happened,<s%> that when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H3543>dim,<s%> so that he could not <S%H7200>see,<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>him,<s%> "My son?" He said to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Here I am."
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "See <S%H2204>now,<s%> I am old. I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Now <S%H5375>therefore,<s%> please take your <S%H3627>weapons,<s%> your <S%H8522>quiver<s%> and your <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H6679>take<s%> me <S%H6718>venison.<s%>

<S%H6213>Make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>food,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H157>love,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H398>me,<s%> that I may eat, and that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and to bring <S%H935>it.<s%>

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>"Behold,<s%> I heard your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H935><s%> 'Bring me <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> me savory <S%H4303>food,<s%> that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H4194>death.<s%>'
Now <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> my son, <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to that <S%H834>which<s%> I command <S%H6680>you.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> now to the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> me from there <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2896>young<s%> <S%H5795>goats.<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them savory <S%H4303>food<s%> for your <S%H1>father,<s%> such as he <S%H157>loves.<s%>
You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to your <S%H1>father,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat,<s%> so <S%H834>that<s%> he may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H6215>"Behold,<s%> Esau my <S%H251>brother<s%> is a <S%H8163>hairy<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and I am a <S%H2509>smooth<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

What if my <S%H1>father<s%> touches <S%H4959>me?<s%> I will <S%H5869>seem<s%> to him as a <S%H8591>deceiver,<s%> and I would <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> on <S%H1293>myself,<s%> and not a blessing."

His <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7045>him,<s%> "Let your curse be on <S%H1121>me,<s%> my son. Only <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> get them for <S%H3947>me.<s%>"

He <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H3947>got<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> and brought them to his <S%H517>mother.<s%> His <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>food,<s%> such as his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved.<s%>

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2532>good<s%> <S%H899>clothes<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> which were with her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and put them <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
She <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H5785>skins<s%> of the <S%H1423>young<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%> on his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and on the <S%H2513>smooth<s%> of his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>
She <S%H5414>gave<s%> the savory <S%H4303>food<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which she had <S%H6213>prepared,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
He <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1>father?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I <S%H1121>am.<s%> Who are you, my son?"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "I am <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> what you <S%H1696>asked<s%> me to <S%H6965>do.<s%> Please arise, <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may bless <S%H1288>me.<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "How is it that you have <S%H4672>found<s%> it so <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gave <S%H6440>me<s%> <S%H7136>success.<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "Please come <S%H5066>near,<s%> that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> my son, whether you are <S%H2088>really<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> Esau or <S%H6215>not.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%> He <S%H4959>felt<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "The <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice,<s%> but the <S%H3027>hands<s%> are the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>"
He <S%H5234>didn't<s%> recognize <S%H3027>him,<s%> because his hands were <S%H8163>hairy,<s%> like his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands.<s%> So he blessed <S%H1288>him.<s%>
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Are you really my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6215>Esau?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Bring it <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H398>me,<s%> and I will eat of my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H5066>you.<s%>" He brought it near to <S%H398>him,<s%> and he ate. He <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and he <S%H8354>drank.<s%>
His <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5066>him,<s%> "Come near <S%H5401>now,<s%> and kiss <S%H1121>me,<s%> my son."

He came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7306>him.<s%> He smelled the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of his <S%H899>clothing,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> is as the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of a <S%H7704>field<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> of the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7230>plenty<s%> of <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine.<s%>

Let <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3816>you,<s%> and nations bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to <S%H1933>you.<s%> Be <S%H1376>lord<s%> over your <S%H251>brothers.<s%> Let your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to <S%H779>you.<s%> Cursed be everyone who <S%H779>curses<s%> <S%H1288>you.<s%> Blessed be everyone who blesses <S%H1288>you.<s%>"

It <S%H3327>happened,<s%> as soon as Isaac had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1288>blessing<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H389>just<s%> <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> that <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> from his <S%H6718>hunting.<s%>

He also <S%H6213>made<s%> savory <S%H4303>food,<s%> and brought <S%H935>it<s%> to his <S%H1>father.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "Let my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H6718>venison,<s%> that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> may bless <S%H1288>me.<s%>"
<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Who are you?" He said, "I am your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%> <S%H3966>violently,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H645>"Who,<s%> <S%H6679>then,<s%> is he who has taken <S%H6718>venison,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H398>me,<s%> and I have eaten of all before you <S%H935>came,<s%> and have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H1288>him?<s%> Yes, he will be blessed."

When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H6817>cried<s%> with an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H6818>cry,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1288>"Bless<s%> <S%H1>me,<s%> even me also, my father."
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit,<s%> and has taken <S%H3947>away<s%> your <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Isn't<s%> he rightly <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob?<s%> For he has supplanted <S%H6117>me<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> two <S%H6471>times.<s%> He took <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1062>birthright.<s%> <S%H3947>See,<s%> now he has taken away my <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H680>"Haven't<s%> you reserved a blessing for <S%H1293>me?<s%>"

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> him your <S%H1376>lord,<s%> and all his <S%H251>brothers<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to him for <S%H5650>servants.<s%> With <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> have I <S%H5564>sustained<s%> <S%H6213>him.<s%> What then will I do <S%H645>for<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> my son?"

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "Have you but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> my <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H1>me,<s%> even me also, my father." <S%H6215>Esau<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> "Behold, of the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be your <S%H4186>dwelling,<s%> and of the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> from <S%H5920>above.<s%>

By your <S%H2719>sword<s%> will you <S%H2421>live,<s%> and you will <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%> It will <S%H6561>happen,<s%> when you will break <S%H7300>loose,<s%> that you shall shake his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off your <S%H6677>neck.<s%>"

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7852>hated<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H834>with<s%> which his <S%H1>father<s%> blessed <S%H1288>him.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> for my <S%H1>father<s%> are at <S%H7126>hand.<s%> Then I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>"

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> her <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> were <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%> She <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> her <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H251>him,<s%> "Behold, your brother <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H5162>comforts<s%> himself about you by planning to kill <S%H2026>you.<s%>
Now <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> my son, <S%H8085>obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> my <S%H251>brother,<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>
<S%H3427>Stay<s%> with him a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H834>until<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H2534>fury<s%> turns <S%H7725>away;<s%>

until your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H7911>you,<s%> and he forgets what you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7971>him.<s%> Then I will send, and <S%H3947>get<s%> you from <S%H4100>there.<s%> Why should I be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of you <S%H8147>both<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%>"

<S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> "I am <S%H6973>weary<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%> If <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> such as <S%H1323>these,<s%> of the daughters of the <S%H776>land,<s%> what <S%H4100>good<s%> will my life do <S%H2416>me?<s%>"
